channel.title: About on Aleph-Zero-Heroes
channel.description: Recent content in About on Aleph-Zero-Heroes

item.title: About
item.description: Aleph-Zero-Heroes The title of the blog comes from a, perhaps obscure, piece of mathematics. Mathematically speaking aleph zero – which we write \(\displaystyle \aleph_0\) – is the cardinality of the set of natural numbers, which is a pretty mathsy way of saying “infinity”. So the name, aleph-zero-heroes, loosely translates as infinite heroes. I don’t just care about superheroes – more broadly they are a archetype that comes up frequently in the context of hybrid narratives, and that is what I want to tap into.
